name: Astronaut (Josh2000)
description:
While exploring a strange grey planet, you find your jetpack fuel is running low and without it, there is no way to get back. You must blast through space, avoiding meteors while maintaining the little fuel you have left while trying to get back to your rocket ship.

The "One Time Use" in this game are the power ups you can find while traversing through the levels, once you use them, they are gone. These power ups will help you get back to your rocket ship faster, so look out for them!

Movement Controls:

Using "A" will move you left and using "D" will move you right. Tapping Space will allow you to hover.
